{{Wired embedded system |brand=FriendlyARM |model=NanoPi R6 |revision=S |asin=B0BN3YB9W1 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |manuf=FriendlyElec |availability=currently shipping |price=119 |est_release_date=10/2022 |type=single-board computer, router |pwr_v=5 |pwr_amp=2 |pwr_conn=USB (Type-C) Female |cpu1_brand=Rockchip |cpu1_model=RK3588S |cpu1_cspeed=1.8-2.4 GHz |cpu1_cores=8 |cpu2_brand=STMicro |cpu2_model=STM32G030F6P6 |cpu2_cspeed=64 |fla1=32 GiB |fla1_brand=Foresee |fla1_model=FEMDNN032G-A3A55 |fla2=32 KiB |fla2_brand=STMicro |fla2_model=STM32G030F6P6 |ram1=8 GiB |ram1_brand=Samsung |ram1_model=K4UBE3D4AA-MGCL |ram1_num=2 |ram2=8 KiB |ram2_brand=STMicro |ram2_model=STM32G030F6P6 |expansion_if_types=USB 2.0, USB 3.0 |expansion_usb_num=2 |serial=yes,, 12-pin header,, (1500000 8N1) |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip2_brand=Realtek |eth_chip2_model=RTL8211F |eth_chip3_brand=Realtek |eth_chip3_model=RTL8125BG (x2) |lan_speed=2.5GbE |lan_ports=2 |wan_speed=2.5GbE |wan_ports=1 |addl_chips=I2C RTC;Haoyu Microelectronics;HYM8563TS;;1;,,, <!-- USB to Serial Interface;WCH;CH340E;;1;,,, 5V, 1A USB Power Distribution Switch;Silergy;SY6280AAC;;3;,,, Programmable USB Type-C Controller w/ PD;On Semi;FUSB302;;1;,,, 40V, 200mA Ultra-Low Dropout LDO;Seaward Elec;SE8533X2-HF;;1;,,, 100mA Fixed Positive Linear Voltage Regulator;Hengjiaxing;HX7533;;1;,,, 26V, 8A Low IQ Synchronous Step-Down Converter;MPS;MP8759;;1;,,, 2A, 1MHz Synchronous Step-Down Regulator;Silergy;SY8089A;;2;,,, 3A, 1.2MHz Synchronous Step-Down Switcher;MPS;MP2143;;1;,,, Power Management IC;Rockchip;RK860-2;;2;,,, Power Management IC;Rockchip;RK860-3;;1;,,, --> Power Management IC;Rockchip;RK806-1;;1; |flags=Micro SD Card slot, HDMI 2.1, IR Receiver, RTC, SPI, I2C, I2S, PWM, UART, GPIO |stock_boot=U-Boot;2017.09; |stock_os=Linux;5.10.110;FriendlyWrt 22.03.2; |tp_firmware=Armbian, DietPi, Ubuntu 22.04 |default_ip=192.168.2.1 |default_user=root }} {{TagLine|Single-board Computer}} :[https://www.friendlyelec.com/index.php?route=product/product&path=69&product_id=289 Product page]
"NanoPi R6S" and "2208" are on top and bottom of board.
{{See also|List of Single-board computers}}
===Links=== *[https://wiki.friendlyelec.com/wiki/index.php/NanoPi_R6S ''NanoPi R6S'' on '''FriendlyARM''' Wiki] *[https://www.cnx-software.com/2022/10/28/nanopi-r6s-rockchip-rk3588s-router-mini-pc-dual-2-5gbe-gbe-hdmi-2-1/ ''NanoPi R6S review'' on '''CNX-Software'''] *[https://linuxgizmos.com/nanopi-r6c-taps-rockchip-rk3588s-soc/ ''NanoPi R6C taps Rockchip RK3588S SoC'' on '''LinuxGizmos''']
===Hardware specification=== *CPU: [[Rockchip]] RK3588S @2.4GHz Quad-core ARM (Cortex-A76) :+ @1.8GHz Quad-Core ARM (Cortex-A55) *GPU: ''Mali-G610 MP4'' (OpenGL ES3.2, OpenCL 2.2); NPU Support 6T :VPU (with 8K@60fps VP9 and 8K@30fps H265/H264 decoding) *MCU: [[STMicro]] [https://www.st.com/en/microcontrollers-microprocessors/stm32g030f6.html STM32G030F6P6] @64MHz ARM (Cortex-M0+) *Storage: 32GB (eMMC 5.1) Flash, TF card (128GB)/MMC card slot *Memory: 8GB (LPDDR4X) SDRAM *Network: 2x 2.5GbE (WAN/LAN), 1x 1GbE (LAN) ports *USB: 1x USB 2.0, 1x USB 3.0 (Type-A) ports *Power Source: USB (Type-C) support PD, 5V/9V/12V/20V
{{WikiDevi.Wi-Cat.RU:Network/NanoPi models}}
==Images== https://www.friendlyelec.com/image/catalog/description/R6S_en_14.jpg
